alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 13 at 2:54AM EDT until July 14 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.5 to 13.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...The High tide very late tonight into very early Thursday morning...roughly a few hours on either side of midnight. * IMPACTS...Splashover and very minor coastal flooding occurs along Morrissey Boulevard in Boston. Splashover and very minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/11 AM 10.0/10.5 0.5/ 1.0 0.6/ 1.1 2 None 14/12 AM 11.9/12.4 2.3/ 2.8 0.6/ 1.1 2 Minor 14/12 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.6/ 1.1 2 None 15/01 AM 12.1/12.6 2.6/ 3.1 0.7/ 1.1 2 Minor 15/01 PM 10.4/10.9 0.9/ 1.4 0.6/ 1.1 2 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories -
